item.title: Terminal Logging With Color
item.description: These days I’ve been writing a lot of babashka instead of reaching for bash or python to do minor scripting tasks at work. I am also a big fan of the work done at charm and the relevant products in this case are gum and lipgloss. Using gum style I can log any text in basically any color I want. And while there’s not a ton of functional benefits to this, I think there’s something to be said about adding color into the logs we write.
